1.No man is poor who has a Godly mother.
2.You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
3.Whatever you are, be a good one.
4.Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing.
5.No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
6.The best way to destroy an enemy is to make him a friend.
7.When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.
8.Those who look for the bad in people will surely find it.
